attributes.action: Make Criminal the "Losing of Information of use to a terrorist" where procedures are not followed and public is endangered, including by loss of Identity details such as NI or Id card or even Biometric information
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are facts the British public read in their news regularly.

Of losses of the 2 computer disks containing 25 million peoples details. 

Of lost top-secret documents containing latest intelligence on al-Qaeda.

Of further documents covering fighting global terrorist funding, drugs trafficking and money laundering.

These are the newsworthy major CURRENT stories, there are no-doubt many more cases that we do not hear about. That these lapses in our security are allowed to happen is inconceivable to us whose liberties are curtailed, who are watched regularly by cctv or who hear that the powers gained under the cloak of "terror" are abused by councils to spy on us and police to control us often without terrorism even being reasonably suspected.

We want tighter procedural security at the civil service, as well as other government bodies. They should be in no doubt as to the procedures.

We ask for criminal charges against those who have breached those procedures, to combat the clear and present danger to our security, wealth and liberty that these breaches cause.

If our security REALLY matters, then please Prime Minister address this issue.
